content:
During the last day, March 12, Russian troops fired at the territory of 145 settlements in nine regions of Ukraine.

About thisinformsMilitary Media Center.

"In general, different types of weapons - mortars, tanks, artillery, RSSV, SDR, OTRC, UAV and tactical aviation - were attacked 145 settlements and 208 infrastructure sites," the statement reads.

As a result of a hostile attack, they are killed and injured among civilians, the number of victims is clarified.

We will remind, in Sumy after the attack of "Shahaneda" from under the rubble10 people got, there are dead.

As reportedArmyinform, the number of victims of the rocket attack of the Russian Federation on Kryvyi Rih increased.
title: More than 140 settlements of Ukraine last day were under enemy shelling
description: About it reports Military Media Center. “In general, from different types of weapons - mortars, ...
author: Army Inform
